body_html:
@peterjc123 I installed the CPU version using the command
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch.

I'm not sure if this might shed more light on the issue but when I ran the command
'where api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll'

I got this output

Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\Library\bin\api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll AppData\Local\Programs\MiKTeX 2.9\miktex\bin\x64\api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dl

body:
@peterjc123 I installed the CPU version using the command 
    `conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch. `


I'm not sure if this might shed more light on the issue but when I ran the command 
'where api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll'

I got this output 

`Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll
Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\Library\bin\api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll
AppData\Local\Programs\MiKTeX 2.9\miktex\bin\x64\api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dl`
